Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 61st overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/2015, off Demetrio Kabas (NY)...
Earned first career win on 4/7/2015...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/2015, off Demetrio Kabas (NY)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2015, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2015, going 4-0, 1.15...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2015, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Injured on 4/14/2017 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 4/11/2018 (Going to CHI: P Dennis Williamson, P Gale Otterson, P John Dill. Going to NY: P Charles Barney)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2018, winning 2 games with a 1.29 ERA...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
